team.section_subtitle: Highly qualified professionals with years of experience dedicated to your transformation
team.preview_description: Meet the specialists who will make your transformation a reality.

guerra.bio: Member of ACICME. Actively participates in medical associations and conferences to stay at the forefront of his specialized discipline.

diaz.bio: Distinguished member of ACES, FILACP, IPRAS, and the Colombian Society of Plastic Surgery. Expert in body and facial surgeries.

botero.bio: ACICME board member and secretary. Expert in aesthetic medicine: Botulinum Toxin, dermal fillers, threads, and collagen biostimulants.

daza.bio: Specialized in Argentina (UCA) and member of A.A.C.M & S.A.C.P.E.R. Expert in facial surgery, body contouring, hand surgery, and hair transplantation.

arango.bio: Graduate of the University of Antioquia. Member of the Colombian Society of Plastic Surgery (SCCP). Expert in liposuction, abdominoplasty, rhinoplasty, and breast surgery.

garcia.bio: Specialized in Plastic Surgery (UdeA), Biomedical Eng. (UPB), and Aesthetic Surgery (UNISANTA, Brazil). Expert in breast, body, and post-bariatric surgery.

jaramillo.bio: Expert in aesthetic procedures (Botox, fillers) and comprehensive post-operative care, including lymphatic drainage and private nursing. 1,500+ satisfied clients.

programs.subtitle: Logical packages based on your health needs
programs.no_results: No programs found matching your search

difference.title: The MediCol Advantage: Data Converted into Action
difference.ai_analysis_description: We use AI software to analyze your images (MRI, CT) and lab results, detecting subtle patterns that the human eye might miss for superior diagnostic accuracy.
difference.smart_report_description: We don't give you a pile of papers. You receive a consolidated, clear, and actionable report explaining what your results mean and what the recommended next steps are.
difference.specialists_panel_description: Your results are reviewed not by a general practitioner, but by a panel of specialists (cardiologists, oncologists, radiologists) from Medell√≠n's best clinics.

experience.title: Your Wellness, Stress-Free
experience.concierge_description: Your MediCol coordinator schedules and manages all your appointments consecutively. No waiting, no bureaucracy. Your only concern is your health.
experience.efficiency_description: Complete all your exams, imaging, and consultations in one place and in record time. What would take months in your country, takes days at MediCol.
experience.results_description: Receive all your results (translated if necessary) in a single digital package and in a follow-up consultation (virtual or in-person) with your specialist.
